name: Princesses Never Lose!
detailed_description:
On the western part of the Stivare Peninsula lies the small kingdom of Torinia. Their princess, Erica, senses the danger to her kingdom, as the peninsula's city-states fall under the influence of a powerful, modernized country.

Seeing this as the potential end of the peninsula's independence, Erica decides to fight for Stivare's dignity.

Her battle to unify the Stivare Peninsula begins!

Features:

  • A classic RPG experience
  • Explore a fantasy world
  • New Game+ system
  • Multiple endings
  • Difficulty system
about_the_game:
On the western part of the Stivare Peninsula lies the small kingdom of Torinia. Their princess, Erica, senses the danger to her kingdom, as the peninsula's city-states fall under the influence of a powerful, modernized country.

Seeing this as the potential end of the peninsula's independence, Erica decides to fight for Stivare's dignity.

Her battle to unify the Stivare Peninsula begins!

Features:

  • A classic RPG experience
  • Explore a fantasy world
  • New Game+ system
  • Multiple endings
  • Difficulty system
short_description: Play as Erica, princess of the Torinia Kingdom, as she fights to unify the Stivare Peninsula against a powerful, modernized country, that threatens to undermine the peninsula's sovereignty.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Princesses Never Lose! contains strong language and partial nudity.
